name: 英國史（二）
description: 探索英國文明之起源和英國國家與制度之形成與發展，以為瞭解近代英國之基礎。其涵蓋的內容包括大不列顛群島之地理環境、英國的史前文明、羅馬時期、盎格魯—薩克遜人之入侵、七國時代、諾曼底人征服、中古封建、都鐸王朝、宗教改革等課題。
goals: 理解英國古代、中世紀以迄於都鐸王朝之歷史發展
syllabus:
**授課方式：16+2週**

第一週       課程介紹、導論     

第二週              土地與人民 (1): 人民與封建制度      

**指定閱讀：**

John Hudson, _The Oxford History of the Laws of England_, vol. 2 (Oxford: Oxford University Press, 2012), 751-772.

參考閱讀：F. M. Stenton, ‘The changing Feudalism of the Middle Ages’, _History_, 19 (1935), 289-301.

第三週              土地與人民 (2): 土地型態

**指定閱讀：** John Hudson, _The Oxford History of the Laws of England_, 627-662.

參考閱讀：Michael Clanchy, _England and Its Ruler 1066-1307_, 4th edn (Wiley Balckwell, 2014), 284-304.

第四週              森林法與王權

**史料閱讀**：The Charter of Forest, 1225, see https://www.nationalarchives.gov.uk/education/resources/magna-carta/charter-forest-1225-westminster/

第五週       家庭與婚姻: 婚姻的構成要件  

**指定閱讀：**

Robert C. Palmer, ‘Context of Marriage in Medieval England: Evidence from the King’s Court circa 1300’_, Speculum_, 59.1 (1984), 42-67.

參考閱讀：

D. L. D’Avray, _Medieval Marriage: Symbolism and Society_ (Oxford; New York: Oxford University Press, 2005).

Mia Korpiola_, Medieval Law and Its Practice: Regional Variations in Matrimonial Law and Custom in Europe, 1150-1600_ (Leiden: Brill, 2011).

第六週              未婚男女的生活：

**指定閱讀：**

Jeremy Goldberg, ‘Desperately Seeking the Dingle Man in Later Medieval England’, in _Single Life and the City 1200-1900_ (Basingstoke: Palgrave Macmillan, 2015), 117-137.

Cordelia Beattie, ‘The Single Woman in Guild Texts’, in _Medieval Single Women: The Politics of Social Classification in Late Medieval England_ (Oxford Scholarship Online, 2008).

參考閱讀：

Broanch Christina Kane, _Popular Memory and Gender in Medieval England: men, women and testimony in the church courts c.1200-1500_ (Woodbridge, Suffolk: Boydell Press, 2019).

第七週           大學教育

**指定閱讀：**

R. N. Swanson, Universities, Graduates, and Benefices in Medieval England’, _Past &Present_, 106  (1985), 28-61.

參考閱讀：

Gordon Leff, _Paris and Oxford Universities in the Thirteenth and Fourteenth Centuries as an Institutional and Intellectual History_ (New York: Wiley, 1968).

第八週                  文藝復興的英格蘭

**指定閱讀：**

Alistair Fox, Chapter 5 ‘Epic and the Formation of National Identity: Ariosto, Tasso, and _The Faerie Queene_’, in _The English Renaissance: Identity and Representation in Elizabethan England_ (Oxford: Blackwell Publishers, 1997).

第九週          期中考

第十週          帝國的基礎：金融革命以及工業革命

**史料閱讀：**The Royal Charter of the East India Company 1601, see https://en.wikisource.org/wiki/Charter\_Granted\_by\_Queen\_Elizabeth\_to\_the\_East\_India\_Company / The Royal Charter of the Bank of England 1694. See  https://www.whatdotheyknow.com/request/6134/response/14050/attach/2/Bank%20of%20England%20Charter%201694.pdf?cookie\_passthrough=1 [https://www.bankofengland.co.uk/museum/online-collections/archive-gallery/founding-documents](https://www.bankofengland.co.uk/museum/online-collections/archive-gallery/founding-documents) ;

參考閱讀：Henry G. Roseveare, _The Financial Revolution_ (London, New York: Routledge, 2014).  

第十一週       維多利亞時期的不列顛

**指定閱讀**: Robert Woods, _The Demography of Victorian England and Wales_ (Cambridge: Cambridge University Press, 2000), 110-143.

參考閱讀: Charles Dickens, _A Christmas Carol: a ghost story of Christmas_ (Minneapolis: Lerner Publishing Group, 2015)

第十二週      演講：維多利亞時期的鑑識科學 賴慧潔博士候選人（成功大學歷史系）

第十三週      一戰與愛爾蘭獨立戰爭

**指定閱讀：**

Michael Hopkinson, Chapter 8 ‘The Irish intelligence system and the development of guerrilla warfare up to the truce’, in _The Irish War of Independence_ (Montreal; Ithaca: McGill-Queen’s University Press, 2002).

參考閱讀：

Gerard Noonan, _The IRA in Britain, 1919-1923: ‘In the Heart of Enemy Lines’_ (Liverpool: Liverpool University Press, 2014).

Tracey Loughran, _Shell Shock and Medical Culture in First World War Britain_ (Cambridge: Cambridge University Press, 2016).

第十四週     從二戰到脫歐

指定閱讀:

Sarah Childs and Paul Webb, _Sex, Gender and the Conservative Party_ (Palgrave Macmillan, 2012), 19-36; 85-110

參考閱讀：

Hugo Young, _This Blessed Plot: Britain and Europe from Churchill to Blair_ (Woodstuck; New York: Overlook Press, 1998).

Jörn Axel Kämmerer, Hans-Bernd Schäfer, ed., _Brexit: legal and economic aspects of a political divorce_ (Cheltenham: Edward Elgar Publishing, 2021).

第十五週      莎士比亞戲劇演出

第十六週      期末考

補充週1 排練莎士比亞戲劇

補充週2       戲劇諮詢
